message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value exceeds $1200000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. To extend this opportunity to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1500000. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, I am looking for something within my budget. Could you consider a price closer to $1000000? I understand this might be below your initial asking price, but I hope we can find a mutually agreeable solution.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. We are willing to consider a price closer to your suggested amount while still maintaining a fair valuation for our product. Our revised offer is $1250000. I hope this aligns more closely with your budget while still reflecting the value of our product.
